name: Anachronox

files.file1:
N/A:Select the Anachronox installer provided by GOG 
Download here: https://secure.gog.com/downlink/anachronox/en1installer0

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Anachronox/anox.exe
files:
- file1: "N/A:Select the Anachronox installer provided by GOG \nDownload here: https://secure.gog.com/downlink/anachronox/en1installer0"
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    description: Installing Anachronox
    executable: ${file1}
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
